languages.text: "Свары между мнимыми союзниками — любимый вид спорта друкари. Сразу после истязаний". {n}В голосе дознавателя сквозит довольство — он явно наслаждается бешенством ксеноса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Свары между мнимыми союзниками — любимый вид спорта друкари. Сразу после истязаний". {n}В голосе дознавателя сквозит довольство — он явно наслаждается бешенством ксеноса.{/n}

languages.text: "Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Свары между мнимыми союзниками — любимый вид спорта друкари. Сразу после истязаний". {n}В голосе дознавателя сквозит довольство — он явно наслаждается бешенством ксеноса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}

"Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}
"Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}

languages.text: « Arranger des conflits entre faux alliés est le passe-temps favori des Drukharis... du moins, après la torture. » {n}Heinrix semble content. La colère de la xénos lui fait manifestement plaisir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Arranger des conflits entre faux alliés est le passe-temps favori des Drukhari... du moins, après la torture. » {n}Heinrix semble content. La colère de la xénos lui fait manifestement plaisir.{/n}

languages.text: “虚伪盟友间的拌嘴，是黑暗灵族最爱的游戏之一，仅次于对折磨的热爱。”{n}海因里希的语气很是愉快。很显然，异形的无能狂怒让他喜闻乐见。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “虚伪盟友间的拌嘴，是黑暗灵族最爱的游戏之一，仅次于对折磨的热爱。”{n}海因里希的语气很是愉快。很显然，异形的无能狂怒让他喜闻乐见。{/n}

languages.text: "Streitigkeiten zwischen falschen Verbündeten sind der Lieblingssport der Drukhari. Nach der Folter, versteht sich." {n}Heinrix klingt zufrieden — er genießt offenbar den Zorn des Xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Streitigkeiten zwischen falschen Verbündeten sind der Lieblingssport der Drukhari. Nach der Folter, versteht sich." {n}Heinrix klingt zufrieden — er genießt offenbar den Zorn des Xenos.{/n}

languages.text: «Los enfrentamientos entre falsos aliados son el deporte favorito de los Drukhari. Después de la tortura, claro». {n}La voz de Heinrix tiene un tono de satisfacción, como si estuviera disfrutando de ver a la xenos airada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los enfrentamientos entre falsos aliados son el deporte favorito de los Drukhari. Después de la tortura, claro». {n}La voz de Heinrix tiene un tono de satisfacción, como si estuviera disfrutando de ver a la xenos airada.{/n}

languages.text: 「上辺だけの協力関係同士の争い事は、デュカーリが大好物の戯れですよ。そう、拷問の次に」{n}ハインリックスは嬉しそうに話す。紛れもなく異種族が激怒する様子を楽しんでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「上辺だけの協力関係同士の争い事は、デュカーリが大好物の戯れですよ。そう、拷問の次に」{n}ハインリックスは嬉しそうに話す。紛れもなく異種族が激怒する様子を楽しんでいる。{/n}

languages.text: "Yalandan müttefiklikler kurmak, Drukharilerin en sevdiği şeydir. İşkenceden sonra tabii." {n}Heinrix memnun görünüyor, zenonun öfkesinden zevk aldığı belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Squabbles between false allies is the favourite sport of the Drukhari. After torture, that is." {n}Heinrix sounds pleased — he is clearly enjoying the sight of the xenos's rage.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yalandan müttefiklikler kurmak Drukharilerin en sevdiği şeydir. İşkenceden sonra tabii." {n}Heinrix memnun görünüyor, zenonun öfkesinden zevk aldığı belli.{/n}
